seller_description: The Stanley Quencher H2.0 FlowState Tumbler is the perfect hydration companion, designed to keep your drinks cold, iced, or hot for hours with its double-wall vacuum insulation. Available in sizes from 14oz to 64oz, its narrow base (excluding the 64oz size) fits most car cup holders, making it ideal for on-the-go use. The advanced FlowState lid features a rotating cover with three positions: a splash-resistant straw opening with a reusable straw, a drink opening, and a fully covered top for superior leak resistance. The ergonomic comfort-grip handle ensures easy portability for work, the gym, or travel. Made from 90% recycled BPA-free stainless steel, this eco-friendly tumbler offers exceptional durability while reducing reliance on single-use plastics. Dishwasher-safe for effortless cleaning, it resists stains and odors, ensuring a pristine look after every wash. Backed by Stanley’s lifetime warranty, this sustainable and reliable tumbler has been crafted with quality since 1913, making it the ultimate choice for anyone seeking long-lasting hydration solutions.
review: if ur looking for an honest review then here it is.. There are absolutely no scratches on mine and i ordered the 30oz which i was nervouse bc i thought it was be smaller…? for some reason.there is no smell to it. i did order the straw covers separately tho! this stanley is in perfect condition and is “real” and i absolutely love it!
Expected_output: The seller description promises a high-quality Stanley Quencher H2.0 FlowState Tumbler that keeps drinks cold, iced, or hot for hours using double-wall vacuum insulation. The tumbler is described as made from 90% recycled stainless steel, dishwasher-safe, and leak-resistant with an ergonomic handle and FlowState lid. The description highlights its eco-friendliness, durability, and suitability for car cup holders. The seller image accurately depicts the product with its ergonomic handle, sleek design, and straw.The buyer image aligns with the seller's promises and images. It shows the tumbler in pristine condition, matching the advertised design, color, and features. The buyer mentions no scratches or defects, confirming the product arrived in excellent condition. The review further supports the description, emphasizing the tumbler's functionality, aesthetic appeal, and authenticity.Conclusion:The product fully meets the expectations set by the seller's description. The buyer's review is positive and confirms the product's quality, with no discrepancies between the images, description, or actual experience. The seller is not at fault; in fact, they delivered as promised. The buyer is highly satisfied, and their feedback reinforces the reliability and appeal of the product.
